description:
At the Law Office of Julian J. Poota, PLLC, we are committed to resolving our clients' legal issues with excellence and compassion. Our Southfield law firm serves Michigan clients in need of zealous representation. We are dedicated to high quality, professional service.

Since 2004, the Law Office of Julian J. Poota, PLLC, has been providing personalized legal representation in the Detroit tri-county metro area and throughout the state of Michigan.

Our law firm takes pride in our accessibility and responsiveness to our clients.

We strive to be efficient and effective in working for your best possible outcome. Our law firm is experienced and confident in taking the path that is most appropriate for your case. We work to bring you peace of mind, providing you flexible representation that can be successful in negotiations, litigation or alternative dispute resolution.

You need a law firm that can be aggressive, yet compassionate and understanding, in helping you return your life to normal.
